title: Hide Menu item photos, fix HND logo transparency, and lighten text colors

requirements.text: Remove/hide the per-menu-item food photos from the Menu item cards so each Menu item displays text content (name, description/note if present, and all prices) plus the existing WhatsApp ordering button/variant-selection behavior, but no food image thumbnail is shown.

quotes: Menu ma item ma Jo photo LGA ha wo HTA do

acceptanceCriteria: In the Menu section, each Menu item card renders without any visible food image/thumbnail area.
Menu item name, optional description/note, and prices render exactly as before (no changes to menu text/prices).
The 'Order on WhatsApp' button remains available per item, and the variant-selection dialog still appears for items with multiple variants.
No empty/blank placeholder image container is shown where the photo used to be.

requirements.text: Remove the HND watermark/logo overlay that is currently rendered on top of each Menu item photo (since Menu item photos are being removed).

quotes: Menu ma item ma Jo photo LGA ha wo HTA do

acceptanceCriteria: No HND watermark overlay is rendered anywhere within Menu item cards.
The CSS class/styles dedicated to the Menu watermark do not cause any visual artifacts or layout spacing issues in the Menu section.

requirements.text: Fix the HND logo image assets used in the header and hero so the logo image itself has a clean, fully transparent background (no visible background box/edges on the dark theme). Update any UI references if the logo filenames change.

quotes: HND KA background sai sa remove kro

acceptanceCriteria: The HND logo displayed in the header and hero appears with a transparent background on the dark UI (no visible box, halo, or solid fill around the logo).
If updated logo filenames are introduced, all current logo usages (header and hero) reference the updated filenames and load successfully.

requirements.text: Update site-wide text colors to be lighter/more readable on the premium dark theme by adjusting the theme tokens/styles so that muted text (e.g., tagline, descriptions, secondary labels) is noticeably brighter while maintaining contrast and hierarchy.

quotes: text colour light ma kro sb

acceptanceCriteria: Body text remains bright and readable across all sections on the dark background.
Muted text (elements using muted-foreground) is lighter than before and remains readable (no low-contrast gray-on-dark).
No user-facing text content is changed (English text remains the same).

constraints: Do not modify any files under frontend/src/components/ui (shadcn components are read-only).
Keep existing Menu item names/prices/categories exactly unchanged; only change presentation (hiding photos) and styling.
No backend changes are required for this request.
nonGoals: Do not add new site sections or change the section navigation behavior.
Do not change WhatsApp phone number/message template logic or ordering flow beyond keeping it working after photo removal.
Do not regenerate or add new food photos for menu items as part of this request.
